content: --गु-गू {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [अध्रि-गम्-कू-डिच् ऊङादेशोवा] of irresistible motion or course (अधृतगमन), impetuous; यदध्रिगावो अग्निगू इदा चिदह्नो अश्विना <ls>Rv. 8. 22. 11</ls> (--गुः <ab>N.</ab> of a heavenly killer of sacrificial victims, or the name of the formula itself ending with an invocation of Agni.
